comments_since_last_sample.body:
Wait… is this a thing? 

Reading through the comments on spring yard… 5 years ago some said it sounds like a Bobby Brown song

Ok.. yes, it is already a thing… weird. [Bobby Brown vs Sonic](https://youtu.be/461uwSax4lc)
